text: is a professional Japanese baseball player. He plays pitcher for the Yokohama DeNA BayStars. ==Career== Mikami signed with the Canberra Cavalry of the Australian Baseball League to play weeks 3-10 of the 2018/19 ABL season. On February 27, 2019, he was selected for Japan national baseball team at the 2019 exhibition games against Mexico. ==References== ==External links== * NPB.com Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Canberra Cavalry players Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Nippon Professional Baseball pitchers Category:Baseball people from Gifu Prefecture Category:Yokohama DeNA BayStars players
title: Tomoya Mikami
